name: Transmute Wine to Blood
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Blood of the Night © 2012, Paizo Publishing, LLC
components: V, S, M (drop of animal blood)
target: bottle of wine worth at least 10 gp
text: You transform one bottle of fine wine into 1 pint of animal blood, sufficient for a creature with the blood drain ability to feed upon as if it came from a Medium animal with 1 Hit Die. If you are using the optional hunger rules, this blood satiates an undead creature's hunger, negating any withdrawal effects, but does not grant the creature a feeding bonus. The blood coagulates and spoils at the normal rate.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、材料 (一瓶动物血液)
target_zh: 一瓶至少价值10gp的葡萄酒
text_zh: 你将一瓶优质葡萄酒转化成一品脱的动物血液，足以喂饱一个有吸血(blood drain)能力的生物，这瓶血液如同来自一个1HD，中体型的动物。如果你使用了饥渴可选规则(见本书P.22)，这血能满足一个不死生物的饥渴，使任何戒断效果无效，但并不会给予生物进食加值。这血会以正常的速度凝固与腐败。
